name: You Are The Rats In The Walls
name_original: You Are The Rats In The Walls
description:
Horror awaits in the deep. However, in this adaptation of H.P. Lovecraft’s classic short story you are not the protagonist. You are madness. You are the rats in the walls.  

Created by Alex Blechman for the Gaming Like It’s 1924 game jam, a contest to celebrate works that have newly entered the public domain.
